entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 2:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:24 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 1:24 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
